HOTSPOT_CONNECTED_CLIENTS_MESSAGE: Joining the network “%@” will disconnect Personal Hotspot users.
ERROR_GEN_CONNECTION_FAILURE: Make sure “%@” is turned on and in range.
ERROR_GEN_PAIRING_FAILURE: Make sure “%@” is turned on, in range, and is ready to pair.
POWER_OFF_WARNING: Location accuracy and nearby services are improved when Bluetooth is turned on.
ERROR_INCORRECT_PIN: Make sure “%@” is ready to pair, the PIN code is correct, and try again.
